import collections

oo, = map(int, raw_input().split())

for o in range(oo):
    m, n = map(int, raw_input().split())
    s = raw_input()
    cc = collections.defaultdict(lambda: 0)
    for i in s:
        cc[i] += 1
    for i in range(n):
        c, t = raw_input().split(" ")
        ccc = cc[c]
        dhvan = (t == "odd" and ccc % 2 != 0) or (t == "even" and ccc % 2 == 0)
        if dhvan:
            print "yes"
        else:
            print "no"
